document.full_text: israel responded to palestinian rocket fire with two air strikes in the gaza strip on friday, officials said, ending a lull in violence since an informal ceasefire took effect earlier in the week.
document.title: israel strikes hamas targets after rocket fire
lines_and_colors: israel responded to palestinian rocket fire with two air strikes in the gaza strip on friday, officials said, ending a lull in violence since an informal ceasefire took effect earlier in the week.
